data.message: Now this sorry sack of shit is sewing New Zealand or sewed rather! for 600k, this broke ass mother fucker wearing a D" shirt you wont see in the hood anymore, not strolling around, because of the hate he spits as much as our current president, he is no better He would get pillaged like so many others now days because of the great divide! Instead of feeding it, how about you try to help fix it!!! We are one, we are family, we are friends, ... stop hurting, killing, stealing from and sewing your neighbors! I told ppl 30 years ago to fuck off...should I sew everyone since that has said that...or maybe I should have copyrighted it!!! Remember your roots! The "D"
